General.Name: XCMG Construction Machinery Co Ltd
General.Description: XCMG Construction Machinery Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of construction machinery in China. The company offers engineering lifting, earth shoveling and moving, compaction, road construction and maintenance, concrete, fire-fighting, pile drilling equipment, and other construction machinery; and truck cranes, truck-mounted cranes, road rollers, asphalt pavers, graders, cold milling machines, and high-lift jet fire trucks, as well as spare parts, such as construction machinery hydraulic parts. The company also exports its products. In addition, it engages in the trading, financial investment, logistics, asset leasing, and engineering and technical information research and development; and provision of technical and sanitation services. XCMG Construction Machinery Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1993 and is based in Xuzhou, China.
